Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section and contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393999) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393999)
